channel.title: CVE Feed for ProPump and Controls, Inc. -- Osprey Pump Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ProPump and Controls, Inc. -- Osprey Pump Controller

item.title: CVE-2023-28375|2024-08-02T12:38:25.071Z -- propump%20and%20controls%2C%20inc. -- osprey%20pump%20controller
item.description: Osprey Pump Controller version 1.01 is vulnerable to an unauthenticated file disclosure. Using a GET parameter, attackers can disclose arbitrary files on the affected device and disclose sensitive and system information.

item.title: CVE-2023-28395|2024-08-02T12:38:25.093Z -- propump%20and%20controls%2C%20inc. -- osprey%20pump%20controller
item.description: Osprey Pump Controller version 1.01 is vulnerable to a weak session token generation algorithm that can be predicted and can aid in authentication and authorization bypass. This may allow an attacker to hijack a session by predicting the session id and gain unauthorized access to the product.

item.title: CVE-2023-27394|2024-08-02T12:09:43.401Z -- propump%20and%20controls%2C%20inc. -- osprey%20pump%20controller
item.description: Osprey Pump Controller version 1.01 is vulnerable an unauthenticated OS command injection vulnerability. This can be exploited to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands through a HTTP GET parameter called by DataLogView.php, EventsView.php and AlarmsView.php scripts.

item.title: CVE-2023-28398|2024-08-02T12:38:25.301Z -- propump%20and%20controls%2C%20inc. -- osprey%20pump%20controller
item.description: Osprey Pump Controller version 1.01 could allow an unauthenticated user to create an account and bypass authentication, thereby gaining unauthorized access to the system. A threat actor could exploit this vulnerability to create a user account without providing valid credentials. A threat actor who successfully exploits this vulnerability could gain access to the pump controller and cause disruption in operation, modify data, or shut down the controller.

item.title: CVE-2023-27886|2024-08-02T12:23:29.843Z -- propump%20and%20controls%2C%20inc. -- osprey%20pump%20controller
item.description: Osprey Pump Controller version 1.01 is vulnerable to an unauthenticated OS command injection vulnerability. This can be exploited to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands through a HTTP POST parameter called by index.php script.
